sqlMap.select: select REC_ID, EMP_ID, ORG_ID, FLOW_ID, PHONE_NO, COM_TITLE, COM_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, APPLY_TIME, BUSSINESS_TYPE, SPARE_COL from T_COMMON_PROCESS where REC_ID = #recId:DECIMAL#

select REC_ID, EMP_ID, ORG_ID, FLOW_ID, PHONE_NO, COM_TITLE, COM_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, APPLY_TIME, BUSSINESS_TYPE, SPARE_COL from T_COMMON_PROCESS
order by $orderByClause$

select REC_ID, EMP_ID, ORG_ID, FLOW_ID, PHONE_NO, COM_TITLE, COM_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, APPLY_TIME, BUSSINESS_TYPE, SPARE_COL from T_COMMON_PROCESS where rownum<2

sqlMap.insert:
select T_COMMON_PROCESS_SEQ.Nextval from dual
insert into T_COMMON_PROCESS (REC_ID, EMP_ID, ORG_ID, FLOW_ID, PHONE_NO, COM_TITLE, COM_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, APPLY_TIME, BUSSINESS_TYPE, SPARE_COL, MAINTITLE) values (#recId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #empId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #orgId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #flowId:VARCHAR#, #phoneNo:VARCHAR#, #comTitle:VARCHAR#, #comContent:VARCHAR#, #createDate:VARCHAR#, #createTime:VARCHAR#, #applyTime:VARCHAR#, #bussinessType:VARCHAR#, #spareCol:VARCHAR#, #mainTitle:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update T_COMMON_PROCESS set EMP_ID = #empId:DECIMAL:-9999#, ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL:-9999#, FLOW_ID = #flowId:VARCHAR#, PHONE_NO = #phoneNo:VARCHAR#, COM_TITLE = #comTitle:VARCHAR#, COM_CONTENT = #comContent:VARCHAR#, CREATE_DATE = #createDate:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #createTime:VARCHAR#, APPLY_TIME = #applyTime:VARCHAR#, BUSSINESS_TYPE = #bussinessType:VARCHAR#, SPARE_COL = #spareCol:VARCHAR# where REC_ID = #recId:DECIMAL#

update T_COMMON_PROCESS
EMP_ID = #empId:DECIMAL:-9999#
ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL:-9999#
FLOW_ID = #flowId:VARCHAR#
PHONE_NO = #phoneNo:VARCHAR#
COM_TITLE = #comTitle:VARCHAR#
COM_CONTENT = #comContent:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE = #createDate:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:VARCHAR#
APPLY_TIME = #applyTime:VARCHAR#
BUSSINESS_TYPE = #bussinessType:VARCHAR#
SPARE_COL = #spareCol:VARCHAR#
where REC_ID = #recId:DECIMAL#

sqlMap.select:
select REC_ID, EMP_ID, ORG_ID, FLOW_ID, PHONE_NO, COM_TITLE, COM_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, APPLY_TIME, BUSSINESS_TYPE, SPARE_COL from T_COMMON_PROCESS
REC_ID = #recId:DECIMAL#
EMP_ID = #empId:DECIMAL#
ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL#
FLOW_ID = #flowId:VARCHAR#
PHONE_NO = #phoneNo:VARCHAR#
COM_TITLE = #comTitle:VARCHAR#
COM_CONTENT = #comContent:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE = #createDate:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:VARCHAR#
APPLY_TIME = #applyTime:VARCHAR#
BUSSINESS_TYPE = #bussinessType:VARCHAR#
SPARE_COL = #spareCol:VARCHAR#
select REC_ID, EMP_ID, ORG_ID, FLOW_ID, PHONE_NO, COM_TITLE, COM_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, APPLY_TIME, BUSSINESS_TYPE, SPARE_COL from T_COMMON_PROCESS

select a.rec_id as RecId, a.emp_id as empId, a.mainTitle, b.empname, a.org_id as orgId, c.orgname, a.flow_id as flowId, a.phone_no as phoneNo, a.com_title as comTitle, a.com_content as comContent, a.create_date as createDate, a.create_time as createTime, a.apply_time as applyTime, a.bussiness_type as bussinessType, a.spare_col as spareCol from t_common_process a, om_employee b, om_organization c where a.EMP_ID=b.EMPID and a.ORG_ID = c.ORGID and (a.REC_ID = #recId:DECIMAL# or a.FLOW_ID=#flowId:VARCHAR#)

select a.empid,b.empname from om_empposition a,om_employee b ,om_emporg c where a.empid = b.empid and a.empid=c.empid and c.ismain='y' and a.positionid!=#positionCode# and c.orgid=#orgid# and c.empid!=#empid#
